listings.title: do wordpress website development, design or redesign wordpress blog
listings.comment: Swapon Mia delivered solid website development work but could improve on professionalism, attention to detail, and aligning closer to expectations. While responsive and understanding, response time, effort, and politeness could use refinement. Overall, Swapon's dedication and ability to go the extra mile stand out, but there's room for growth in key areas.

listings.title: do wordpress website development, design or redesign wordpress blog
listings.comment: The final product was good; however, throughout the project there were language barrier and time zones challenges, which we anticipated. He was very responsive and we were able to successfully complete our task. I would use his services again and I would recommend him to others, but be mindful of the language barrier and time zone challenges. Lastly, I'd recommend establishing clear expectations for the start of the project.

listings.title: do wordpress website development, design or redesign wordpress blog
listings.comment: Swapon Mia demonstrated strong technical skills in web development and dedication to the project, resulting in a website that I am very happy with. While there is room for improvement in completing tasks as requested and focusing on attention to detail—such as adhering to specifications and avoiding unnecessary changes—his hard work and commitment are greatly appreciated. I am confident that by addressing these areas, Swapon will continue to deliver excellent results and further enhance his already impressive skill set.

listings.title: do wordpress website development, design or redesign wordpress blog
listings.comment: Working with Swapon Mia was a seamless experience! The website development project was BUG FREE and exceeded expectations with incredible ATTENTION TO DETAILS. 🤩 His politeness and fluency ensured smooth communication and timely delivery. No need to look further, THIS COMPANY IS THE RIGHT CHOICE!

listings.title: do wordpress website development, design or redesign wordpress blog
listings.comment: Swapon Mia did an OUTSTANDING job on my project, delivering a bug-free and highly professional website that exceeded my expectations. He was polite, punctual, and went above and beyond to ensure everything was perfect—communication was a breeze too! Highly recommend working with him! 🙌
